title: The Remarkable Case of Davidson's Eyes
description: The Remarkable Case of Davidson's Eyes tells the story of Davidson, a scientist whose life changes dramatically after an accident in his London laboratory. A fellow scientist, Bellows, narrates the intense fear, confusion, and disbelief that result when it becomes clear that the accident has caused Davidson to see a different reality than the one he experiences physically. While Davidson remains in London, he can only visualize sights of a faraway island. How will Davidson navigate living in two realities at the same time? Will his life ever revert back to normal?
